marklogic.body:
"Your Competitive Position Is Eroding" - Yawn - management consultant fear mongering.
The more accurate statement is that "your competitive position is changing" and at any given time you have no real idea where you stand. Many successful companies have no idea why they are suddenly successful and manage success no better than failure. It's only in hindsight that the myths are made. If you spend all your time staring at and sweating the market - you will never find that thing that makes your company successful and deliver on it.
Xerox is a good example, regardless of the corporate BS they spew, their solutions are over priced and they are horrible at customer service. The only companies who can afford their idea of "green" are fortune 500 with money to Burn on pet projects. There are so many better, Fleeter competitors nipping at their heels they can't compete in any segment but huge and bureaucratic. The Xerox corporate strategy from a customer standpoint looks like - be over priced and mediocre and try to lock in the customer financially till they Bleed.
